resources.string: Q. Do I need to pay extra to order using this site/app? \n Ans. Not as long as the restaurant you order from is not charging any convenience fees you don\'t have to pay extra. Restaurants can choose to charge conveniece. Our goal is to provide best online ordering and deliver system to restaurants and delivery services which offer the best possible experience for customers.

Q. Do restaurants ever receive my Credit Card / PayPal information?
 Ans. Our systems are secure. We use https to encrypt and pass the information directly to Clover/Square/Stripe or Paypal. In some cases, we communicate to the restaurant the name on the card as well as the last 4 digits to aid in fraud prevention so that they can verify information.

Q. Can I cancel an order after placing it?
 Ans. Please check with the restaurant. You cannot cancel an order for which the restaurant may have started processing. In case the restaurant has not started processing the order, you can call the restaurant phone # or send an email (which is provided in your order details).
Thank You! Your Order has been placed!!
